A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson brings a new and enjoyable take on Star Wars\, it takes our expectations and fan theories and turns it on its head. For once in a very long time\, we now have a Star Wars story that is not predictable and we have no clue where the story in the sequel is going and just like A New Hope it brings back that \"a nobody like Luke or even me can be a Hero\" feeling which a lof of people seem to forget about.
